concept.title: Dashboard
concept.shortdesc: This page displays a high level overview of all cloud resources and their alarm status.

conbody.section:
Alarm Table
Each service will have a graph displayed with the total number of alarms in the middle.
The bar graphs displays an indicator that shows the alarms in each of these states:
Purple: Open.
Light Blue: Acknowledged.
Gray: Resolved. You can click on any of these indicators to pull up a list of the alarms.
